references: Amending: Ord 62662, Ord 72495, Ord 72630, Ord 102620, Ord 103566
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for access to certain City Tax Records by members of the City Council and its staff and the Office of Management and Budget and amending Section 15 of Ordinance 62662, Section 15 of Ordinance 72495 and Section 19 of Ordinance 72630.
